Class TextureMaker

Use methods in this class to create Unity textures with settings generators. All textures are created using 2D settings (i.e, Z coordinate is always 0), and sample source settings in [0,1]x[0,1] area.

Make(Int32, Int32, Func<Single, Single, Color>, TextureFormat)

Generic texture-building method. Creates a texture using a fuction that transforms float coordiantes (in the range [0,1]x[0,1]) into color

RampTexture(Int32, Int32, Generator, Texture2D)

Creates a texture using ramp of colors. Noise value (clamped to [-1,1]) is mapped to one-dimensional ramp texture to obtain final color. As there are no 1-dimensional textures in Unity, Texture2D is used, that is sampled along its top line.

Declaration
public static Texture RampTexture(int width, int height, Generator noise, Texture2D ramp)
Parameters
